name: Quill Content
description:
Quill is the leading multi-language content production platform for ecommerce businesses, defining a completely new model for high-volume, high-quality, multi-language content creation, based on the powerful combination of technology and talent.
 
We produce Primary Content: the critical pre-purchase information that drives online performance, such as product and category descriptions and buying, how-to and destination guides. To date we have created over 47 million words of bespoke content – plus videos and graphics – for 170+ clients, including global brands such as Tommy Hilfiger, Argos, Google, Thomas Cook, eBay, Trivago, Farfetch, Dunhill, John Lewis and Louis Vuitton.  

Our model leverages a highly flexible, global network of 2,400+ freelance content creators working 24/7/365, centrally managed through the Quill Cloud platform: pioneering technology that streamlines and automates complex production and quality control processes to enable a level of efficiency, speed and scale that’s impossible to attain in-house or via traditional agencies.
